website_summaries.verdict: From skate shoes to leisure ones, the DC Shoes brand sure knows about style. DC Pure High-Top sneakers feature that excellent street-style flair that the brand is known for. The shoes’ looks are equally matched by their durability and solid build that’s guaranteed to last you a long while. As further incentives to purchase these kicks, they also contain amazing comfort and the perfect fit.Don’t expect too much arch support from these shoes as they have little. However, their padding and cushioning should be enough for discriminating consumers.
pros: Many people were happy about the fit of DC Pure High-Top shoes (also called DC Pure WC SP)
These are quality lifestyle kicks with a solid build according to a few reviewers
A handful reported that these shoes descending from the Pure silhouette by DC are comfortable
DC Shoes’ Pure WC SP high-top kicks have a simple, clean look that matches with a lot of clothing types, claimed some buyers
The leisure sneakers looked exactly as described and pictured, one purchaser stated
Several consumers remarked that DC Pure High-Top sneakers are quite durable and last a long time
One person added that his pair still looks new even after months of use
cons: Two reviewers stated that DC Pure High-Top shoes run about a half size smaller than standard sizing
A buyer reported that you could get them true to size by pulling out the removable insoles
One customer complained that the high-top DC shoes have no arch support

customer_reviews.title: Nice shoes, but
customer_reviews.text: Nice shoes, quality seems good. Fit is about right. I got the black and white ones, which seem to be discontinued but they are the best ones!! I gave it 4 star and not 5 because If and when I want to buy another pair, I can't because they decided not to sell them anymore
customer_reviews.author: Rafa

customer_reviews.title: Awesome
customer_reviews.text: These are probably the most comfortable shoes I’ve ever owned. And they look amazing. If you like DC’s (of course you do) you need these in your life. You know what to do
customer_reviews.author: Anna

customer_reviews.title: Awesome, as usual.
customer_reviews.text: Always wear DCs and these are no different. Great fit, great look, very comfy.
customer_reviews.author: Dan Thayer

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic!!!
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely fantastic service. Fast delivery. Top notch product :) my partner absolutely loves them! Thank you.
customer_reviews.author: Christina wylie

customer_reviews.title: Nice
customer_reviews.text: Fitted as expected, looks very nice I'm pleased with my purchase
customer_reviews.author: Otto

customer_reviews.title: Top shoes
customer_reviews.text: Good fit and super comfy as usual from DC shoes
customer_reviews.author: Bazza

customer_reviews.title: Comfy, looks good, arrived fast
customer_reviews.text: Arrived in 3-4 days. Great fit, and I love them
customer_reviews.author: Jay

customer_reviews.title: Great Christmas Present
customer_reviews.text: Exactly as the picture and loved by the recipient as this was a Christmas gift
customer_reviews.author: Amateur reader

customer_reviews.title: dc trainers
customer_reviews.text: got these for our son for christmas he loves this make of trainers comfy and they do last he a long time great colour im always looking for different colours every year for him he only wares this make
customer_reviews.author: Savlon

customer_reviews.title: Impressive
customer_reviews.text: Very performed very nice you can feel the steps when you walk I will recommend too every teenager looking very smart
customer_reviews.author: Gabi Donisa

product_meta.title: DC Shoes Men's Pure High-top Wc Skateboarding Shoes
product_meta.description:
Featuring upper in leather, nubuck, and/or suede upper, mesh lining, and rounded out with a foam padded tongue and collar. These leather high-top shoes for men join the line-up in the DC Shoes Footwear Collection.
Pure High-Top - Leather High-Top Shoes for Men
feature_bullets: __Upper:__ Leather, nubuck, and/or suede upper [depending on colourway]
Foam padded tongue and collar for added comfort and support
